content:
RVP is based on existing standards and efforts

  • Based on the GENA framework

    • Strict extension of HTTP/1.1
    • SUBSCRIBE, UNSUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, POLL

  • Adopts the DAV property model

    • Uses the DAV MKCOL, PROPFIND, PROPPATCH methods
    • User resources have an “online-status” property, besides others

  • Users, lists, resources have URIs:

    • e.g. “http://im.microsoft.com/users/sonuag/” or “http://im.microsoft.com/lists/product_announcements/”
